function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workers and technical engineers working with full consciousness and scrutiny","Impact":"Heightened awareness and vigilance may still result in the spread of infectious disease","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, regular testing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and temperature screening devices","People":"Workers and technical engineers","Owner":"Management and project leaders"},{"Description":"Off-site workers and project participants required to maintain constant communication and coordination","Impact":"Lack of coordination and communication can lead to inefficiencies and potential spread of infectious disease","Mitigation":"Use of collaboration tools, daily check-ins, and clear communication protocols","Technologies":"Project management software, video conferencing platforms, and task management apps","People":"Off-site workers and project participants","Owner":"Project managers and team leaders"},{"Description":"Modification of construction management to accommodate sudden crises","Impact":"Inadequate preparation for sudden crises can result in project delays and increased risk of infectious disease spread","Mitigation":"Developing contingency plans, training staff for emergency response, and stockpiling essential supplies","Technologies":"Emergency alert systems, supply chain management software, and crisis communication tools","People":"Construction management personnel","Owner":"Construction management and project leadership"}]}
